official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a project for flood protection for Lake Wichita and Holliday Creek, Texas.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct the project for flood control on Lake Wichita and Holliday Creek, Texas.
